alert.note: Alert for Aguas Buenas (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 06 at 5:53PM AST until February 06 at 7:45PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Aguas Buenas in Puerto Rico... * Until 745 PM AST. * At 553 PM AST, Emergency management reported that the Bayamon River is out of its banks and flooding the areas along the river. Mudslides were also reported in the area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen, causing excessive runoff. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Mudslides. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Mudslides. This includes the following streams and drainages... Rio Bayamon. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
